mapper.select: select inn_no, room_no, room_name, room_max_people, room_price, etc_option, room_min_people, inn_check_in_time, inn_check_out_time from room_tbl r join inn_tbl using(inn_no) where inn_no=#{innNo}
select * from inn_file_tbl where inn_no=#{innNo} and room_no is null
select * from inn_file_tbl where inn_no=#{innNo} and room_no is not null
SELECT o.option_no, o.option_name FROM room_tbl r JOIN room_option_tbl ro ON r.room_no = ro.room_no JOIN option_tbl o ON ro.option_no = o.option_no WHERE r.inn_no = #{innNo} AND r.room_no = #{roomNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_TBL (REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_NO, REVIEW_TYPE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_STAR, REF_NO, REVIEW_DATE) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.nextval, #{memberNo}, 1, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewStar}, #{innNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT review_no,member_nickname,review_title,review_content,review_star,ref_no,to_char(review_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')as review_date FROM review_tbl join member_tbl using(member_no) WHERE ref_no = #{innNo} ORDER BY 1 DESC
select review_no,member_nickname,review_title,review_content,ref_no,to_char(review_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')as review_date from review_tbl join member_tbl using(member_no) where member_no=#{memberNo}

select * from (select rownum rnum, ibt.* from (select inn_book_no, (select partner_name from partner_tbl where partner_no in (select partner_no from inn_tbl where inn_no in (select inn_no from room_tbl where room_no = ib.room_no))) partner_name, (select inn_filepath from inn_file_tbl where room_no = ib.room_no and rownum = 1) inn_filepath, (select room_name from room_tbl where room_no = ib.room_no) room_name, book_status, check_in_date, check_out_date, to_char(to_date(check_in_date), 'mm.dd(dy) ')||(select inn_check_in_time from inn_tbl where inn_no in(select inn_no from room_tbl where room_no=ib.room_no)) check_in_date_str, to_char(to_date(check_out_date), 'mm.dd(dy) ')||(select inn_check_out_time from inn_tbl where inn_no in(select inn_no from room_tbl where room_no=ib.room_no)) check_out_date_str, (to_date(check_out_date)-to_date(check_in_date)) night, book_guest, guest_name, guest_phone, to_char(book_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') book_date, guest_wish from inn_book_tbl ib where member_no in (select member_no from member_tbl where member_email=#{memberEmail}) order by check_in_date, inn_book_no desc)ibt) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum rnum, rr.* from (select inn_no, inn_type, (select partner_name from partner_tbl where partner_no=inn.partner_no) partner_name, nvl((select avg(review_star) from review_tbl where review_type=1 and ref_no=inn_no),0) review_rate, (select inn_filepath from inn_file_tbl innfile where inn.inn_no = innfile.inn_no and rownum=1) as filepath from inn_tbl inn where inn_no in (select inn_no from review_tbl r where review_type=1) order by review_rate desc, inn_no desc)rr) where rnum between 1 and 16

select inn_no, partner_no, inn_type, inn_addr, inn_check_in_time, inn_check_out_time, (select partner_name from partner_tbl where inn.partner_no = partner_no) partner_name, (select min(room_price) from room_tbl where inn.inn_no = inn_no) min_room_price, (SELECT inn_filepath FROM inn_file_tbl innfile WHERE inn.inn_no = innfile.inn_no AND ROWNUM = 1) as file_path from inn_tbl inn where inn_no in (select ref_no from like_tbl where member_no = #{memberNo})
mapper.delete: delete from like_tbl where member_no = #{memberNo} AND ref_no = #{innNo}
